title: Is Jimmy Oliver's Burger Professor McDonald's inappropriate for human consumption?
subtitle: An old debate over McDonald's use of ammonium hydroxide treated beef reappeared on social media in 2018.
author: David Emery
vclaim: The celebrity chef Jimmy Oliver proved that meat in the McDonald's hamburger was "inappropriate for human consumption" because of the use of treated beef trimmings with the killing of ammonium hydroxide bacteria.
